text: Eghtɨ akam inigha izir gumazibar tav kamaghɨn mɨkɨm suam, Gumazamiziba dabirabir aghuim ikiam, e foghan kogham, akar kam a guizbangɨra, o puvatɨ. Eghtɨ gɨn, akam guizbangɨram otoghtɨ, e datɨrɨghɨn fogham, Bar guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God akar kam isa, akam inigha izir gumazim ganɨngigha anemadazɨ a ize.”
